overview: Over 30 minutes of live action sing-along video with both English and Spanish versions in stereo and split-track.  Songs included:  Jesus Loves Me  Joshua Fought the Battle of Jericho  I Have Decided to Follow Jesus  This is my Commandment  Little David  Every Promise in the Book is Mine  Peter, James and John in a Sailboat  I Will Sing of the Mercies of the Lord Forever  Dare to be a Daniel  My God is So Big  Silver and Gold Have I None  Jesus Wants Me for A Sunbeam  Jesus Loves Even Me  Give Me Oil in My Lamp  The B-I-B-L-E  Everybody Ought to Know
title: Cedarmont Kids Bible Songs
